title.rendered: Socialistics Announced as a 2021 Local Excellence Award Winner by UpCity!

content.rendered:
For more than a decade, UpCity’s mission has been—and continues to be—to help businesses find B2B service providers they can trust. The UpCity Recommendability Rating was developed to determine a service provider’s credibility and recommendability, giving UpCity the confidence to recommend them to the more than 1.5 million businesses that visit their site.

Each year, UpCity analyzes and scores more than 70,000 service providers based on their UpCity Recommendability Rating and acknowledges the top national and local providers with an UpCity Excellence Award.

The results are in, and we won! We are ecstatic to announce that the Socialistics team has been recognized as one of the top
B2B service providers of 2021 in the Seattle area by UpCity! At Socialistics, we help our clients cut through all the noise of social media with engaging, innovative campaigns that foster stronger connections.

Dan Olson, CEO of UpCity, had this to say about Socialistics:

“The team at Socialistics is dedicated to creating high-quality content on a variety of
social media platforms to help their clients be successful. It’s a group of extremely
talented marketers who always seem to be ahead of the pack. Congratulations on the
2021 Local Excellence Award!”

This recognition has been driven in large part by our 5-star review rating on UpCity. Here are a
few of our favorite pieces of feedback we’ve received from our incredible customers:

“Fostering an authentic connection with their partner, the team accurately articulated the
offerings of the company online, which has resulted in fewer confused customers. They
quickly understood goals, yielding a strong ROI. Their attentive project management
style added value.”
– Troy Linn

“Socialistics has been working on a new website, name, and branding, and I am ecstatic
about the results so far. Additionally, they have given me relevant and helpful marketing
advice specific to my industry. I would definitely recommend Socialistics.”
– Jennifer Childs

“The team at Socialistics delivers a high-quality service. Their skilled expertise
complemented their efficient workflow. Their dedication to their clients is also
noteworthy. Expect a responsive and expressive team of technical experts.”
– Kevin Scudder

Thank you to UpCity for this award, and thank you to all of our clients who have helped make it
possible. We enjoy producing social media content that adds value and reaches a larger
audience, and we look forward to the opportunity to continue to help our clients grow.

@graph.name: Jason Yormark
@graph.description: Jason is a 20+ year marketing veteran including time spent at Microsoft overseeing social media for Microsoft Advertising & Office for Mac. Once named to Forbes Power Social Media Influencers List, Jason is the owner and founder of Socialistics.
